credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Wall decoration
provenance: Ex collection: Giovanni Piancastelli and Purchased form Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash
description: Two female terminal figures in front support a drapery with their extended arms.  A trellis architecture with three openings through which trees are visible forms the upper part of the decoration.  Usual background.
name: Drawing
